transformations.name: MapDrifted1
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> EMPReadFromDatalake
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select isnull(max(empno),0) as maxempno from emp',
	format: 'query') ~> MaxEmpID
EMPReadFromDatalake, MaxEmpID join(1==1,
	joinType:'cross',
	broadcast: 'none')~> JoinEmpWithMaxEmpId
MapDrifted1 keyGenerate(output(empno as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
SurrogateKey1 derive(empno = empno+maxempno) ~> UpdateSurogateKey
JoinEmpWithMaxEmpId derive(ename = toString(byName('ename')),
		maxempno = toInteger(byName('maxempno'))) ~> MapDrifted1
UpdateSurogateKey select(mapColumn(
		ename,
		empno
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRequiredColumns
SelectRequiredColumns sink(input(
		movie_title as string,
		actor_name as string,
		director_name as string,
		gross as integer,
		duration as integer,
		num_critic_for_reviews as integer,
		num_voted_users as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table') ~> MovingDataAzureSQL
